textBeforeTable: RSS Quote Reply I noticed guest cannot post, and must register first. I thought guests were going to be able to post without registering, until spammers became a problem. Did we start getting spammers? Or did you decide against guest posting without registration? Just wondering.... textAfterTable: We're sorry, but you must register to post in this forum. This is the only way we can keep spammers out. You can remain totally anonymous, and we will keep your email address completely confidential. Click here to login
